title: Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 803 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
July 22, 2014

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 803




On Tuesday, July 22, 2014, the President signed into law:
H.R. 803, the "Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act," which reauthorizes and reforms core workforce development programs administered by the Departments of Education and Labor and transfers from the Department of Education to the Department ofÂ Health and Human Services certain disability and independent living program functions.
